Documentation: Is the unique identification of a client.
Each outbound delivery has an unique identifier, the outbound delivery number. Outbound deliveries of different clients and system partners can however have the same delivery number.
Unique identification of a system partner (see SystemPartner).
The identifier of the warehouse location.
The identifier for the outbound delivery type. Each client may maintain multiple, unique delivery types.
The time the delivery reaches the customer.
The date/time when all loading units of this delivery have to be in the staging area.
The date/time when all loading units of this delivery have to be loaded.
The time the delivery leaves the warehouse.
Unique identification of a shipping method.
Unique identification of a shipping category (see ShippingCategory).
Defines the priority of this delivery.
Specifies the value (or amount) in currency unit which was entered by a user.
Uniquely identifies the currency unit.
Delivery location
Part of the unique identifier.
The identification of the delivery category.
The unique ID of this area within the WhLoc
The unique ID of the dock
Unique ID for the staging area.
The identifier of the storage location per warehouse location.
Defines the total number of warehouse quantity units of the delivery.
Defines the total planned dangerous goods points of the delivery.
Specifies the value (or amount) in weight unit which was entered by a user.
Uniquely identifies the weight unit.
Specifies the value (or amount) in volume unit which was entered by a user.
Uniquely identifies the volume unit.
The delivery's total number of lines.
The delivery's total number of primary lines.
The delivery's total number of picking plan loading units.
The delivery's total number of whole plan loading units.
The delivery's total number of shipment plan loading units.
Defines the total number of warehouse quantity units of the delivery.
Defines the total delivered dangerous goods points of the delivery.
Specifies the value (or amount) in weight unit which was entered by a user.
Uniquely identifies the weight unit.
Specifies the value (or amount) in volume unit which was entered by a user.
Uniquely identifies the volume unit.
The delivery's total number of picking shipment loading units.
The delivery's total number of whole shipment loading units.
The delivery's total number of hierarchical shipment loading units.
The delivery's total number of sub shipment loading units.
Defines the outbound delivery main state.
Specifies the progress in the planning process for a particular outbound delivery.
Defines the release state of the outbound delivery.
Defines the picking state of the outbound delivery.
Defines the loading state for the outbound delivery.
Is set to true if the outbound delivery has been canceled.
